title: MLOCDS-419-quarto-collaboration
text: Can I do collaborative editing with Quarto?

title: MLOCDS-419-quarto-collaboration
text:
Features

Serverless, all comments will be stored as github issues/github discussion

title: MLOCDS-419-quarto-collaboration
text:
User Requirements
For all three solution we would need: - users to login their github account to authenticate with utternaces/gitalk/giscus.

title: MLOCDS-419-quarto-collaboration
text:
Developement:

Create our own GitHub app - see how in wiki. Need svc-github-admin rights.
